name: Bowling Score
short_description:
A simple Java project meant to compute the score of a bowling game.

Currently implemented:
- src/ao.bowling: architecture for the bowling game (a Game can be played by multiple Players, each Player has 10 Frames in which to knock down the pins within 1-3 Throws)
- test/ao.bowling: JUnit test cases for a few typical scenarios

TODO:
- parse&sanitize user input (sequence of numbers representing number of pins knocked down at each throw)
- simple swing interface where user inserts data and gets the score
- documentation
summary: Simple Java project to compute the bowling score
